name: 102 .9 Dimension Shifter
description:
Game Jam created game with the theme 'transmission' and 'shatter'. 

Use the knob and switch on the radio to change stations, move faster/slower, and change dimensions! Completed levels give a rating from C through S.
Can you get an S on all four levels?

Created by :

Leah Blasczyk   -   Programming
Wesley McWhorter   -   Programming
David Sebald   -   Programming/Sprites
Ben Stempinski   -   Sprites/Backgrounds
Spencer Carey   -   Audio
